subject: Add 14 remaining revenue models - Complete 20/20 models
body:
Implemented all remaining revenue models across 6 batches:

Batch 1: Subscription Family (2 models)
- Retainer Agreements: Monthly retainer with overage and price increases
- Managed Services: Base fee + expansion + setup fees

Batch 2: Usage-Based Family (2 models)
- Pay-Per-Transaction: Transaction-based revenue with growth
- Credits/Token System: Pre-purchase credits with usage tracking

Batch 3: Project Delivery Family (3 models)
- Time and Materials: Hourly billing with utilization tracking
- Fixed-Price Projects: Upfront + milestone payments over duration
- Outcome-Based/Milestone: Performance bonuses on milestone completion

Batch 4: Free-to-Paid Family (1 model)
- Open Core: Free downloads converting to enterprise + support

Batch 5: Platform/Intermediary Family (3 models)
- Marketplace/Platform Fee: GMV-based with take rate
- Revenue Share Partnership: Partner revenue sharing with growth
- Advertising Supported: CPM-based ads + premium conversions

Batch 6: Enterprise License Family (3 models)
- Enterprise License Agreement (ELA): Multi-year contracts with renewals
- Data Licensing: License + renewal + usage fees
- White Label/OEM: Setup + platform + revenue share

All models include:
- Detailed input configurations with proper defaults
- Complex calculation logic matching real-world scenarios
- Revenue tracking and growth patterns
- Compatible with universal metrics system
- Work with multi-model comparison UI

Updated claude.md to reflect completion of all 20 models.
